Entries.patio_Tom: Hello, sweetheart! What are your plans for today?$1#Me? I'm just relaxing.$3
Entries.spouseRoom_Tom: Want to watch a movie together?$3
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Looks like it's a rainy day, @. How about we curl up indoors with a good book and some cuddles?$7
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey there, @. Had a good dream about you. Maybe I tell you about it later.$7
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Seems like the rain isn't letting up anytime soon, @. How about we challenge each other to a game instead?$6
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I was planning on doing some outdoor training today, but I guess the rain had other plans.$2
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: The smell of the rain is really nice. Don't you think, @?$3
Entries.Rainy_Day_Tom: The smell of the rain is really nice. Don't you think, @?$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Hey, love. How about we tackle some indoor activities today? Like baking something tasty!$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Seeing you every day still takes my breath away. How did I get so lucky to have you as my partner?$4
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Can I confess something, @? Even after all this time, I still feel like I'm falling for you all over again every single day. And I wouldn't have it any other way. $7
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Hey, @, I was thinking we could try out that new recipe we saw the other day. What do you say?$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: You know, @, I never get tired of spending time with you.$7
Entries.Indoor_Day_Tom: There's never a dull moment when I'm spending it with you, @.
Entries.Indoor_Day_5: I whipped up a little something special for breakfast. Come and get it while it's hot!$8[201 211 195]
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Just listening to the rain tapping against the window, I can't help but feel at peace. Wouldn't you agree, @?$1
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: The rain outside is really soothing, isn't it, @? Makes me feel grateful to be safe and warm indoors.$3
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: The patter of raindrops outside almost sounds like a lullaby, @. Ready to drift off to sleep?$7
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: The sound of rain always brings back memories... Some good, some not so much.$2
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: The rain's really coming down hard. Hope the crops can handle it.$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: @, my love. I can't get you out of my head. It's like you're the only thing I think about, even after all this time.$8
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: It's nice to wind down with you after a long day, @. How about we share some stories or reminisce about our favorite memories?$7#Remember how we first met? It feels like it was just yesterday.$8
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Just being here with you, @, makes me forget about all the worries of the day.$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_Tom: Will you be ready for bed soon, @? I can't wait to cuddle up with you.$4
Entries.funLeave_Tom: I will be away for a bit. But I will come back and kiss you as many times as you want me to.$7
Entries.funReturn_Tom: I'm home, my beautiful husband.$8^I'm home, my beautiful wife.$8
Entries.Outdoor_0: You know, @, there's something about your smile that's downright irresistible. It's like a magnet, pulling me closer every time I see it.$3
Entries.Outdoor_1: So, @, have I mentioned how stunning you look today? It's like every time I see you, you just keep getting more and more captivating.$3
Entries.Outdoor_2: There's something about the fresh air outside that always clears my mind, @. Don't you feel it too?$8
Entries.Outdoor_3: The scenery around here never fails to impress me, @. It's as if every view is a masterpiece.$8
Entries.Outdoor_4: Just being outdoors with you, @, makes even the simplest moments feel special.$7
Entries.Outdoor_Tom: The scenery around here never fails to impress me, @. It's as if every view is a masterpiece.$8
Entries.OneKid_0: You and %kid1 is the best thing in my life!$4
Entries.OneKid_1: You, me, and %kid1 make quite the team, don't you think?$8
Entries.TwoKids_0: Watching %kid1 and %kid2 play together warms my heart, @. They're lucky to have you as their parent.$8
Entries.TwoKids_1: Our little ones bring so much joy into our lives, @. It's incredible to see them grow and learn every day.$8
Entries.TwoKids_2: Our family is complete with our two little bundles of joy, @. I'm grateful for every moment we share.$8
Entries.Good_0: Every day with you feels like a blessing, @. Let's keep making memories together.$8
Entries.Good_1: Your presence alone brightens up even the gloomiest of days, @.$8
Entries.Good_2: Just wanted to say, @, I appreciate everything you do. Thank you.$8
Entries.Good_3: Hey, @, don't forget to take some time for yourself today. You deserve it.$8#Want me to help you?$7
Entries.Good_4: Whatever the day holds, @, I know we'll face it together. That's what matters.$8
Entries.Good_5: I'm feeling especially grateful for you today, @. Thanks for being by my side.$8
Entries.Good_6: I can't help but smile knowing you're here with me, @. Let's make today a great one.$7
Entries.Good_8: Just wanted to remind you, @, you're amazing. Never forget that.$7
Entries.Good_9: Hmm... No, nothing. Just thinking about you.$7
Entries.Neutral_0: Things are pretty quiet today, @. Not much happening, but that's okay.$6
Entries.Neutral_1: It's been a rather uneventful day, @. Just going with the flow, I suppose.$6
Entries.Neutral_2: Honestly, @, I'm feeling a bit indifferent today.
Entries.Neutral_3: Just another day in the books, @. Nothing particularly noteworthy happened, for better or worse
Entries.Neutral_4: Things are pretty calm today, @. Not much to report, but that's alright.$6
Entries.Neutral_5: Guess it's just one of those average days, @.
Entries.Bad_0: Some days just don't go as planned.$2
Entries.Bad_2: I'll be honest, @, today was rough.$2
Entries.Bad_3: I was really hoping for a better outcome today.$2
Entries.Bad_4: Well, this is a bit disappointing, @.$2
Entries.Bad_6: It seems like nothing's going right today...$2
Entries.Bad_7: I can't shake off this feeling of disappointment, @.$2
Entries.Bad_8: Today just wasn't our day, was it, @?$2
Entries.Bad_9: I had high hopes for today, but it didn't quite pan out...$2
Entries.spring_1: Happy new year, love. I'm always happy to wake up beside you!$l
Entries.summer_10: What will you add on the soup for tomorrow?
Entries.summer_27: Dance of the Moonlight Jellies, tomorrow huh? $8
Entries.winter_28: A new year tomorrow? I'm happy I can still wake up with you every day, my love.$8
Entries.spring_Tom: Spring is the season of new beginnings.
Entries.summer_Tom: Don't stay out in the sun too long today, love.
Entries.fall_Tom: Ah, the scent of crisp fall leaves and pumpkin are in the air.$1
Entries.winter_Tom: Are you feeling chilled by the winter air, sweetheart?$1
Entries.Resort: Ginger Island is quite the paradise, isn't it?$1
Entries.Resort_Bar: Ah, the bar! While I'm not a fan of alcohol, I'm glad they offer refreshing drinks without it. Let's enjoy something non-alcoholic together, shall we?$3
Entries.Resort_Entering: Stepping foot on Ginger Island always fills me with a sense of adventure. Who knows what we'll discover today?$6
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Leaving Ginger Island is always bittersweet. Until next time, paradise.$8
Entries.Resort_Shore: The shore is the perfect spot to take in the beauty of Ginger Island. Don't you think?$7
